name: Firestopper
description:
Oh no! Purpletown is on fire! The citizens must work together to stop the fire from spreading and save the city!

You help the citizens pass water buckets around by pressing your keyboard keys. Try your reflexes in this fast typing game and don't let purpletown burn down to ashes!

This game was made for the #1 Stay Safe! Jam (2020) by me (Caio Guedes)

---
